trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Filter" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Filter" /> .

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Filter?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Filter?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: In this example, `listingDataView` is an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, `listingDataView` é uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the implementation of the example `ShowOnlyBargainsFilter` filter event handler.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra a implementação do exemplo `ShowOnlyBargainsFilter` manipulador de eventos de filtro.

trans-unit.source: This event handler uses the <xref:System.Windows.Data.FilterEventArgs.Accepted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to filter out `AuctionItem` objects that have a `CurrentPrice` of $25.00 or greater.
trans-unit.target: Este manipulador de eventos usa o <xref:System.Windows.Data.FilterEventArgs.Accepted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade filtrar `AuctionItem` objetos que têm um `CurrentPrice` de $25,00 ou superior.

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see [Data Binding Demo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).
trans-unit.target: Para o exemplo completo, consulte [Data Binding Demo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).
